articles.title: Mohammed Shami Breaks Silence On Sania Mirza Marriage Rumours, Says "If You Have Guts..." - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Indian cricket team fast bowler Mohammed Shami has finally addressed the rumours involving him and tennis star Sania Mirza.
articles.content: Indian cricket team fast bowler Mohammed Shami has finally addressed the rumours involving him and tennis star Sania Mirza. Various social media posts speculated that Shami and Sania are about to get… [+1778 chars]

articles.title: First Chandipura Virus Death in Gujarat: 4-Year-Old Victim - Oneindia
articles.description: Gujarat confirms its first death from the Chandipura virus, a 4-year-old girl, amid an outbreak affecting multiple districts.- Watch Video on English Oneindia
articles.content: A 4-year-old girl in Gujarat has died from the Chandipura virus. This is the state's first confirmed death from this virus. There are 29 reported cases and 14 suspected deaths. The virus is spreading… [+1492 chars]

articles.author: Akriti Anand
articles.title: NASA's Sunita Williams explores watering plants in space: When will Starliner astronauts return to Earth? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: NASA said Indian-origin Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, who skyrocketed to space on Boeing's Starliner spacecraft on July 5, “continued exploring ways to effectively water plants in the weightless environment”.
articles.content: As part of the drill, the teams aboard the orbital outpost and on the ground coordinated communications and reviewed procedures in the unlikely event of a pressure leak, chemical leak, or fire aboard… [+2484 chars]
